Package org.apache.wayang.core.platform

Class CrossPlatformExecutor

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.platform.CrossPlatformExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExecutionState
public class CrossPlatformExecutor extends Object implements ExecutionState
Executes a (cross-platform) ExecutionPlan.

    • executeUntilBreakpoint

      public boolean executeUntilBreakpoint(ExecutionPlan executionPlan, OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
      Execute the given ExecutionPlan.
      Parameters:
      executionPlan - that should be executed or continued
      Returns:
      whether the ExecutionPlan was completed (i.e., not suspended due to the Breakpoint)

    • prepare

      public void prepare(ExecutionPlan executionPlan, OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
      Clean up ExecutionStage-related state and re-create CrossPlatformExecutor.StageActivators etc. from the ExecutionPlan/
      Parameters:
      executionPlan - whose ExecutionStages will be executed
      optimizationContext - contains additional optimization info for the executionPlan
